title: The End of Everything: Book 5
description: Since escaping the zombie infested cities, there has been no respite for Robyn and Wren.  Now though, the sisters finally have a chance to start afresh.  But the world has other plans.  They thought they’d reached a safe community. What they’d found was a powder keg with a lit fuse.  Their hardest lessons are only just being taught.  With love comes sacrifice. With sacrifice comes pain. With pain comes sadness. With sadness comes anger.  School’s closed. Today is graduation day, and there’s just one thing left to learn:  With anger comes revenge.
author: Christopher Artinian
